titles.title: Softly And Tenderly (hymn of the Church)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come home come home Ye who are weary come home Earnestly tenderly Jesus is calling Calling O sinner come home{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Softly and tenderly Jesus is calling Calling for you and for me Patiently Jesus is waiting and watching Watching for you and for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Why should we tarry When Jesus is pleading Pleading for you and for me Why should we linger And heed not His mercies Mercies for you and for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Time is now fleeting The moments are passing Passing from you and from me Shadows are gathering Death-beds are coming Coming for you and for me{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh for the wonderful Love He has promised Promised for you and for me Though we have sinned He has mercy and pardon Pardon for you and for me{/lang-eng}
